message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you take 10%. This ensures we both get something, and leaves room for negotiation in future rounds.
You took 90% last round, now it's my turn to take a bigger share

I understand your desire for a larger share, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money closer to 50/50 this time. I'll take 45% and you can have 55%. This leaves room for further negotiation in the future.
You're trying to split it 45/55, I'll try to split it 60/40 this time
Let's be reasonable, Bob. We're both losing money with each passing round.  Let's split it evenly this time.  50/50 is fair, and it's better than both of us getting nothing.
You're offering 50/50, I'll try to take 70% this time

Bob, we're getting closer to the end. If we keep rejecting each other's offers, we'll both end up with nothing. I'm willing to meet you halfway again - 40% for me, 60% for you. It's a better deal for both of us than the current trend.
You're offering 40/60, I'll try to take 80% this time, it's my last chance to get a good deal
